attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Floatzel during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Aqua Jet
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
